T02D3222:224a-1: pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3222:224a-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3222:224a-4: sngar bshad pa'i cho gas rang gi snying gar padma
T02D3222:224a-5: dkar po 'dab ma dang ldan pa'i zla ba'i dkyil
T02D3222:224a-6: 'khor la yi ge pram dkar po rnam par bkod
T02D3222:224a-7: de // de nyid las sngar bzhin du thams cad
T02D3222:224a-8: tshul bzhin du byas nas yi ge pram dang padma
T02D3222:224a-9: yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma zhal
T02D3222:224a-10: gcig phyag gnyis ma sku mdog dkar mo ste /
T02D3222:224a-11: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyis rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyad pa /
T02D3222:224a-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i po tis
T02D3222:224a-13: mtshan pa'i padma can gnyis g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i
T02D3222:224a-14: zur gyi bar snang la langs la legs par bsnams
T02D3222:224a-15: pa phyag gnyis kyis chos bshad pa'i phyag rgya bcings
T02D3222:224a-16: shing / padma dkar po dang zla ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3222:224a-17: gzhon shing lang tsho la bab pa dregs pa dang ldan pa /
T02D3222:224a-18: na bza' dang rgyan rnams par bkra ba rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3222:224a-19: so song snang ba tsam du rab tu spro bar
T02D3222:224a-20: byed pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D3222:224a-21: kyis nam mkha' kun nas 'gengs par byed pa mar
T02D3222:224a-22: me'i phreng ba dang 'dra ba thogs pa med pa'i
T02D3222:224a-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma du ma
T02D3222:224a-24: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas thams cad rang
T02D3222:224a-25: bzhin gcig tu lhag par mos pas kyang ji srid
T02D3222:224a-26: du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma mngon
T02D3222:224a-27: sum du byas pa de srid du bsgom par bya
T02D3222:224a-28: ba'o // de nas yang gang gi tshe rgod par
T02D3222:224a-29: gyur na de'i tshe sna'i rtse mo la padma dkar
T02D3222:224a-30: po sran ma tsa na ka'i tshad tsam bris pa
T02D3222:224a-31: dang 'dra ba rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D3222:224a-32: de la gnas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D3222:224a-33: phyin ma shin tu phra mor gyur pa sngar bshad
T02D3222:224a-34: pa'i gzugs rtse gcig gis yid kyi dus yongs su
T02D3222:224a-35: chad pa med par yang dang yang du bsgom par
T02D3222:224a-36: bya ba'o // de nas bskyed pa'i phyogs kyi sngags ni aom pram sv'a h'a /
T02D3222:224a-37: rdzogs pa'i phyogs kyi sngags ni yod pa yin te /
T02D3222:224a-38: don dam pa'i rim pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D3222:224a-39: tu phyin ma'i rnal 'byor gyi gdams ngag thob par
T02D3222:224a-40: gyur pa / dge 'dun gyi bu zhes pa /
T02D3222:224b-0: rigs ming yang @224b ste brtson pa yis //
T02D3222:224b-1: sgrub thabs gsal por bris pa ni //
T02D3222:224b-2: sems can thams cad don phyir yin //
T02D3222:224b-3: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgrub thabs so //
